Web Development.title: Personal Portfolio Website
Web Development.description:
A responsive personal website that highlights skills, projects, achievements, and contact information.
It includes an about section, portfolio showcase, and contact form.
Designed to create a strong first impression for recruiters or scholarship panels.

Web Development.title: Weather App
Web Development.description:
A web app that shows live weather data for any location using the OpenWeather API.
Displays temperature, conditions, and forecasts in real-time.
Helps users plan their day based on weather updates.

Web Development.title: Online Notes App
Web Development.description:
A digital notebook where users can write, save, and edit notes.
Includes search and category features for organization.
Ensures accessibility from any device with cloud storage.

Web Development.title: Online Polling System
Web Development.description:
A web app where users can create polls and vote in real-time.
Displays instant results with charts.
Useful for surveys, feedback collection, and decision-making.

Database Management System.title: Library Management System
Database Management System.description: Manages books, members, and lending records with search, borrow, and return features, reducing manual paperwork.

Database Management System.title: Inventory Management System
Database Management System.description: Maintains stock records, supplier details, and purchase history to track product availability.

Database Management System.title: Hospital Management System
Database Management System.description: Tracks patient details, doctor schedules, and appointments while maintaining medical records securely.

Database Management System.title: Visitor Management System
Database Management System.description: A web-based system for recording and managing visitor information in offices, schools, or organizations. It captures visitor details like name, contact, purpose of visit, in-time, and out-time, storing them securely in a database.

Internship.title: Student Mental Health and Academic Stress Analysis Survey
Internship.description: This project surveys college students to understand the impact of academic stress on mental health, including exam pressure, sleep habits, and access to support systems. The results will help develop wellness strategies and promote awareness.
Internship.tech_stack: Google Forms, Python (Pandas, Matplotlib), Flask (for web app, optional)

Internship.title: Online Learning and Distance Learning Satisfaction Survey
Internship.description: The project evaluates student satisfaction with online and hybrid learning environments post-COVID. It gathers feedback on platform usability, learning effectiveness, and digital challenges faced.
Internship.tech_stack: Google Forms, MS Excel or Google Spreadsheet

Internship.title: Smart Feedback Analyzer for Online Learning Platforms
Internship.description: Use survey responses to rate and recommend e-learning platforms (Coursera, NPTEL, Udemy) based on student performance improvement and satisfaction.

Internship.title: Impact of Mobile Addiction on Academic and Social Life
Internship.description: Survey usage hours, preferred platforms, and effects on focus, health, and social interaction. Recommend digital detox plans.
Internship.tech_stack: Google Forms, Python (correlation analysis), Chart.js in Flask/React

MERN Stack.title: To-Do List App
MERN Stack.description: A basic CRUD app where users can add, edit, mark as complete, and delete tasks. The backend exposes REST APIs for task management, and the frontend uses React to display and interact with the tasks in real time.

MERN Stack.title: Notes Keeper
MERN Stack.description: Users can create, search, and delete notes. Notes are stored in MongoDB and retrieved via an Express API. Great for learning state management and search filtering in React.

MERN Stack.title: Expense Tracker
MERN Stack.description: Users can add income and expense entries, filter by category/date, and see graphs of their spending habits. Focuses on MongoDB aggregations and chart rendering in React.

MERN Stack.title: Book-Store
MERN Stack.description: A digital library where users can browse, search, and save books. Optional admin panel for adding/removing books. Good for CRUD with search filtering.

MERN Stack.title: Event Booking System
MERN Stack.description: Users can view upcoming events, book tickets, and see booking history. Admin can create and manage events.

MERN Stack.title: Restaurant Menu App
MERN Stack.description: Display a restaurant menu, allow table booking or online ordering. Admin panel for updating menu items.
MERN Stack.tech_stack: React, MongoDB, Node.js, Express.js, Tailwind CSS
